speaker: sergeant
dialog: Yes; As sparrows eagles, or the hare the lion. If I say sooth, I must report they were As cannons overcharged with double cracks, so they Doubly redoubled strokes upon the foe: Except they meant to bathe in reeking wounds, Or memorise another Golgotha, I cannot tell. But I am faint, my gashes cry for help.

speaker: duncan
dialog: So well thy words become thee as thy wounds; They smack of honour both. Go get him surgeons. Who comes here?
